choiceresponse.p: Which of the following three things can cause a broken secure channel?

checkboxgroup.choice: The computer cannot authenticate because the password is out of sync
The computer has been inactive for an extended period
There is a DNS resolution problem
There is a network connection problem

div.p: The operating system was reinstalled, The computer has not been active for an extended period of time, The computer cannot authenticate because the password is out of sync. Computer accounts and the secure relationships between computers and their domain are robust. Nevertheless, these scenarios can cause a broken channel.
